name: Spotify Buddies: an organic playlist recommender
para: MLOps System Pipeline for an organic playlist recommender, including data pipeline, scalable training, deployment, and monitoring.

name: LoRa with RoBERTa on AG-News dataset
para: Fine-tuned RoBERTa model using LoRa on the AG-News dataset. My submission was top 1 on a Kaggle competition that had +400 participants.

name: ResNet on CIFAR-10 dataset
para: Trained a ResNet with the restriction of <5 million parameters on the CIFAR-10 dataset, achieving 96% test accuracy.

name: ML Projects at NYU
para: Designed and trained over 20 ML models including regressors, classifiers, ensembles, neural networks, and reinforcement learning agents. Focused on scalable MLOps pipelines and model serving efficiency for deployment on cloud platforms like AWS.

name: Certify
para: Developed a Yelp-like web application for car listings featuring image uploads, geolocation clustering, search filters, user authentication, and reviews. Built REST APIs, implemented authorization, and deployed with production-ready tools.
